items.question: What kind of data is required?
items.answer: OPC UA topic streams (sensor, event, metrics, etc.)

items.question: How is COLIGO different from COLIGO lite?
items.answer: COLIGO includes everything in COLIGO lite plus real-time monitoring, giving you complete visibility of devices, topics, and data flows in one place.

items.question: Do I need historical data first?
items.answer: No ‚Äî streaming learning allows immediate use.

items.question: Can I monitor and analyze at the same time?
items.answer: Yes ‚Äî the Monitor and AI modules work together to give you real-time visibility and predictive insights.
